title: Installation failure time_test.TestTicker
body:
by **rrcollege**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.Did ./all.bash in $GOROOT/src directory as specified
2.
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected output:

--- cd ../test
N known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs

What I see:

--- FAIL: time_test.TestTicker
	10 ticks of 1e+08 ns took 1.210377e+09 ns, expected 1e+09
FAIL
make[1]: *** [test] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/home/me/go/src/pkg/time'
make: *** [time.test] Error 2



What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOROOT=$HOME/go
GOARCH=386
GOOS=linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
a215d03e7ee1 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
Followed all of the installation steps then ./all.bash failed after it had
been running for a while, seems like a rounding error or something based on
the output.
